Social And Cultural Activities: Set up many instutions,(schoools and degree colleges) for girls; and insturmental in setting up of institutions for the economical development, Distt. Camoor; and worked hard to achieve 6th rank in literacy rate of Distt. Camoor, Bihar
Educational Qualifications: B.Sc., LL.B. Educated at Banaras Hindu University, Varanasi and Harishchandra College, Varanasi
Other Information: Joined politics as a member of Samajwadi Yuva Jan Sabha and active member of Samajwadi movement since 1962-63
